title: Introduction to Web3 Development
description: Learn the fundamentals of blockchain and Web3 development, including smart contracts, DApp development, and blockchain architecture.

chapters.description: Understand the basic concepts and working principles of blockchain

lessons.description: Basic concepts and history of blockchain technology

lessons.title: How Blockchain Works
lessons.description: Deep dive into the technical details of blockchain

chapters.description: Learn how to write smart contracts using Solidity

lessons.description: Syntax and basic structure of the Solidity language

lessons.title: Writing Your First Smart Contract
lessons.description: Create a simple smart contract from scratch

title: Practical AI Application Development
description: Learn how to develop artificial intelligence applications using Python and TensorFlow, including machine learning model training and deployment.

lessons.description: Data processing with Pandas and NumPy

chapters.description: Learn common machine learning algorithms and models

lessons.title: Supervised Learning Algorithms
lessons.description: Detailed explanation of regression and classification algorithms

lessons.title: Introduction to Neural Networks
lessons.description: Fundamentals of deep learning and neural networks

title: Professional Nutritionist Certification
description: Comprehensive study of nutrition, including meal planning, nutritional assessment, and special populations' nutritional needs to obtain professional nutritionist certification.

chapters.title: Nutrition Fundamentals
chapters.description: Understand basic nutrients and dietary principles

lessons.title: Macronutrients
lessons.description: Functions and requirements of proteins, fats, and carbohydrates

lessons.title: Micronutrients
lessons.description: Functions and sources of vitamins and minerals

chapters.title: Meal Planning
chapters.description: Learn how to create healthy meal plans

lessons.title: Dietary Guidelines
lessons.description: Comparison and application of various national dietary guidelines

lessons.title: Meal Planning for Special Populations
lessons.description: Creating meal plans for athletes, pregnant women, and the elderly

title: Fitness Trainer Certification Course
description: Study exercise science, training program design, and client management to become a professional fitness trainer.

chapters.description: Understanding the human muscular and skeletal systems

chapters.title: Training Program Design
chapters.description: Learn how to design effective training programs

lessons.title: Strength Training Principles
lessons.description: Basic principles and methods of strength training
